How familiar it felt. So, it might be a bit odd that MW3 is wholly unsurprising for being more COD and simultaneously, a surprise for being more COD. Really, I think it comes down to developer Sledgehammer's decision to mash some of COD's previous triumphs with some of its finest maps.
Despite COD extending its hand with a warm welcome back, I can't help but feel it's one trembled with nerves. MW3's beta suckered me in with its nostalgia hits but there's definitely an air of it being a stopgap as devs figure out where it should turn next.
Read more
articles.title: Modern Warfare 3's multiplayer beta seemed like a warm welcome back, riddled with anxiety

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
The fleetingly Epic Games-owned online audio distribution company Bandcamp have shed "at least" half their staff in the course of being sold off to Songtradr as part of mass layoffs at Epic this summer. That's according to the union Bandcamp United, who are even now restarting discussions with Epic in the hope of obtaining a better outcome.
It's terrible news for those affected, of course, but it also doesn't bode well for the future of independent music. Bandcamp, which has now traded hands twice in two years, is one of the few places where indie musicians can make a living. There are plenty of angry reactions from musicians and bands on social media, as you'd expect, but game developers are also rallying in support of Bandcamp United, with criticism aimed at Epic and Songtradr in equal measure.

 
Read more
articles.title: Devs from Rockstar, Necrosoft and more slam Epic and Songtradr for "trashing" Bandcamp as layoffs announced

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
"I am most moved and always have been by stupid courage — the kind when, against all odds, the hero just keeps going," William Goldman once said. This is a thing Goldman I have in common. To help you tell us apart, a point of difference between Goldman and I is that he expressed his love of stupid courage by writing Butch Cassidy And The Sundance Kid, whereas I express mine by really liking Cyberpunk 2077.

Stupid courage is a trait that CD Projekt Red's first-person RPG seems to admire, but that's never more clear than in a new ending to the base game added by the Phantom Liberty expansion. It shows what happens when the heroes reject stupid courage and choose self-centred pragmatism instead. Spoilers for Cyberpunk 2077 and Phantom Liberty throughout.

 
Read more
articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077's new ending is its most heartbreaking, and worth returning for

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
David Moralejo Sánchez's Outpath, a blend of island base-building game and idle clicker, is now out on Steam with a launch discount and a rapidly growing sackful of positive reader reviews. The gist, for those who missed out on the demo: you walk around small islands punching resources out of the landscape, building crafting stations and dwellings, and slowly amassing the means to access other islands. Or, you ignore all that, and treat the whole thing as an idle clicker, with no time limit and no real opportunity to fail. 

 
Read more
articles.title: First-person Forager-like Outpath, out today, is also like Minecraft SkyBlock for lazy people

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Epic have dropped a bunch of details as to planned improvements for the Epic Games Store in the on-going race to out-Steam Steam - the Coca-Cola to Epic's Pepsi Max. Amongst other things, we can expect more robust search features, support for third-party subscriptions, better EGS launcher performance, a download manager with improved controls, and a new "for you" personalisation tab - all of that rolling out across 2024 and 2025.


Naturally, Epic will be continuing with their free games program through "2023 and beyond", and they've also put together a couple of special publishing offers for developers, Epic First Run and Now on Epic, which are designed to lure more studios from the amoeba-like embrace of Valve's gaming empire.

 
Read more
articles.title: Epic detail plans for Epic Games Store improvements - and how they're going to tempt more devs from Steam

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Satrapa)
articles.description: Není server jako server a v DNS to platí dvojnásob. V hierarchii domén existuje několik různých typů serverů, jejichž role se významně liší. Vysvětlíme si, za co který zodpovídá a jak pracuje.
articles.title: Principy fungování DNS: role různých typů serverů při řešení dotazů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: S projektem Transcrypt popsaným na začátku týdne je velmi úzce spojen projekt nazvaný Numscrypt (Nµmscrλpt). Jedná se o částečnou portaci známé knihovny Numpy do JavaScriptu, takže funkce z Numpy je možné využít v pythonních skriptech.
articles.title: Numscrypt aneb Numpy běžící ve webovém prohlížeči

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Macek)
articles.description: Ať chcete nebo ne, časem se šestce nevyhnete. Internet ji potřebuje pro další rozvoj a po celém světě ji už využívá téměř polovina uživatelů, aniž to tuší. Není to složité, ukážeme si pár příkladů.
articles.title: Základy nasazení IPv6: od získání adres až po síť pro hosty

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si odemkneme zaheslované PDF dokumenty, vyzkoušíme šikovného správce souborů, shlédneme pár seriálů a integrujeme si AppImage do systému.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (25. 10. 2023): odemkněte PDF chráněné heslem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: V dnešním článku se seznámíme s nástrojem Transcrypt, což je další překladač (přesněji řečeno transpřekladač – transpiler) zdrojových kódů z Pythonu do JavaScriptu. Nabízí i celou řadu funkcí ze standardní knihovny Pythonu.
articles.title: Transcrypt: technologie umožňující použití Pythonu v prohlížeči

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CESNET CERTS)
articles.description: Pravidelná dávka aktuálních informací z oblasti kybernetické bezpečnosti. Dnes si zkontrolujeme vzdálené velení, pošleme mozek do penze, uklidíme si ve směrovačích a zakousneme se do jablka z druhé strany.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: outsourcing mozku na chatboty

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: openSUSE pracuje na vlastním instalátoru s názvem Agama. Vyšel nejnovější nástroj Raspberry Pi Imager s podporou RPi 5. Lehká linuxová distribuce SparkyLinux navržená pro staré i nové počítače má tři nové edice.
articles.title: openSUSE vyvíjí nový instalátor, SparkyLinuxu má tři edice

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Intel OSPRay 3.0 s GPU akcelerací ray-tracingu, podpora Intel Meteor Lake v Linuxu 6.7, Vulkan 1.3.269 a CUDA/ARM, Mesa 23.3 a podpora Radeonů RDNA3 Refresh, Intel Arc A580 a vysoká spotřeba v klidu.
articles.title: Test Intel Arc A580 na Linuxu, IBM POWER11 v GCC

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Generaci procesorů Ivy Bridge uvedl Intel na trh v roce 2012. Dodnes na takové to běžné počítačování stačí, jak ukazuje můj nejnovější přírůstek do stáje, kancelářský stroj od HP.
articles.title: Stařičký stroj HP Pro All-in-One 3520 a zbrusu nová Mageia 9

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Satrapa)
articles.description: Domain Name System je fascinující – jedná se o klíčovou službu Internetu, kterou všichni denně využíváme, ale přitom „není vidět“. Jak je sestaven doménový strom? Co je to TLD? Existují i jiné hierarchie?
articles.title: Principy fungování DNS: doménový strom, kategorie TLD a alternativní stromy

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Jak X.Org Server, tak XWayland mají nové dílčí aktualizace, které řeší opravy tří nalezených zranitelností. Jde o další balíček chyb, které se v X.Org objevily po dvou chybách v X11 sahajících až do roku 1988.
articles.title: Nové verze XWayland a X.Org Server řeší tři bezpečnostní chyby

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Nejnovější verze balíku Vulkan ovladače od AMD, tedy AMDVLK ve verzi 2023.Q4.1, už neobsahuje podporu pro staré Radeony generací Polaris a Vega. Modely jako Radeon RX 480 (rok 2016) či Vega 56 a Vega 64 (rok 2017) tak už nemohou s touto verzí využívat API Vulkan. Uživatelé tak buď musejí setrvat na starší verzi AMDVLK 2023.Q3, nebo sáhnout po Mesa RADV.
articles.title: AMDVLK 2023.Q4.1 už bez podpory Radeonů generací Vega a Polaris

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Oliver Fourdan z Red Hatu se blíže na svém blogu rozepsal o pokroku v tzv. Rootful módu XWaylandu. Ten od vydání letošní verze XWayland 23.1 přináší zlepšení v podpoře nastavení geometrie / rozlišení vnořeného X11 serveru, volitelnou integraci knihovny libdecor pro poskytování titulků oken či jejich dekorací. XWayland 23.2+ zase přináší dynamicky měnitelnou velikost těchto rootful oken.
articles.title: XWayland s Rootful Mode přináší lepší podporu běhu X11

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Štrobl)
articles.description: Pokud vyvíjíte svůj vlastní software a váš kód není jen oku lahodící, stavte se na dalším meetupu Cloud Native Prague. Dalším tématem je Continuous Integration, kde si povíme, jak automaticky sestavovat balíky vašich aplikací a probereme některé z technologií, které se v dnešní době používají. Nikdo přece jen nechce zbytečně čekat, než bude mít k dispozici balík pro nasazení na produkci. Samozřejmě otestovaný, že?
articles.title: Cloud Native Prague #6: jak na Continuous Integration

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Terraform vám umožní spravovat infrastrukturu jako kód, to znamená verzovanou v Gitu, přidávání zdrojů pomocí merge (pull) requestů a mnoho dalších výhod. Ukážeme si, jak Terraform pracuje, jak jej používat v týmu a jak jím spravovat infrastrukturu.
articles.title: Terraform: spravujte infrastrukturu jako kód (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Raptor Lake Refresh, neboli 14 generaci Intel Core, máme úspěšně na světě, ač za moc nestojí. Po ní přijde 15. generace Arrow Lake (notebooky ještě stihnou mezigeneraci Meteor Lake, ta ale pro desktopy nebude uvedena) a právě pro ni Intel začíná připravovat podporu všech potřebných částí, včetně podpory hardwarové akcelerace videa.
articles.title: Intel připravuje akceleraci videa pro desktopový Arrow Lake (15. generace Core)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vlastně už jsme si skoro zvykli, takže nejnovější informace od Canonicalu není šokem: firma i nadále hodlá držet tradici posledních LTS vydání Ubuntu Linuxu, kdy právě LTS vydání mají a nadále budou mít podporu 10 let.
articles.title: Canonical bude nadále držet podporu LTS vydání 10 let

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Kromě čištění starého kódu pro ethernetová zařízení se v Linuxu chystá i další čistka, a to v oblasti podpory zastaralých a již nepoužívaných Wi-Fi řešení. Na světě jsou jisté počáteční ideje, které ze starých Wi-Fi ovladačů vyhodit, věcí se mimo jiné zabývá vývojář Arnd Bergmann ze společnosti Linaro.
articles.title: Aktualizace plánu na odstranění ovladačů starých Wi-Fi z Linuxu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Jednou z novinek Firefoxu 119 je zahrnutí většího množství obsahu do přehledové stránky Přehled Firefoxu – lze zde nalézt všechny otevřené panely ze všech oken a pokud uživatel synchronizuje svůj účet přes více zařízení, uvidí zde i panely z ostatních zařízení. Historie prohlížení je v přehledu zobrazena jako seznam a lze ji třídit dle data či domovské stránky.
articles.title: Firefox 119: úpravy PDF či lepší přehledová stránka

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: bkralik)
articles.description: Za poslední měsíc se událo spoustu nového. Se strahovskými bastlíři jste se mohli potkat na LinuxDays, kde jste si mohli zapájet demoboard s novým procesorem CH32V003 – RISC-V za deset centů, pro který mimochodem Vojta Suk napsal programátor běžící na Flipper Zero. Vyšlo Raspberry Pi 5 se spoustou inovací (i nových bugů), nový iPhone s Thread rádiem a USB-C místo Lightningu (který začali bastlíři hned hackovat) a v KiCADu už jde dělat databázové knihovny přes Inventree.
articles.title: Virtuální Bastlírna vol. 31: už jste si pohráli s RISC-V za 10 centů?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Miro)
articles.description: Bezplatný webinář se uskuteční ve čtvrtek 26. října od deseti hodin. Tématem bude efektivní komunikace s blížící se novou verzí Zabbixu 7.0 prostřednictvím jeho API. Alois Zadražil představí způsoby, jak využít Zabbix API k automatizaci běžných úkolů a provede vás různými možnostmi integrace, které Zabbix API nabízí.
articles.title: Online webinář zdarma: komunikace se Zabbixem 7.0 pomocí API

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Raspberry Pi Foundation oznámila očekávané vydání jednodeskového počítače Raspberry Pi 5, který nabízí rozhraní PCIe a je více než dvakrát výkonnější než jeho předchůdce. Do konce příštího týdne budou odeslány všechny prioritní zásilky a všichni oficiální prodejci obdrží počáteční zásoby 4GB i 8GB varianty.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi 5 je venku, prodejci jej naskladní během dvou týdnů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Pátá verze jednodeskového počítače Raspberry Pi byla oznámena na konci září. Přináší několik vylepšení, včetně PCIe 2.0 a několikanásobně výkonnějšího GPU. Alasdair Allan z Raspberry Pi Foundation se zaměřil na měření výkonu procesoru v benchmarku Geekbench.
articles.title: Raspberry Pi 5 je více než dvakrát rychlejší než předchozí verze

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Chceš začít s programováním? Python je oblíbený programovací jazyk mezi vývojáři i zaměstnavateli a zároveň super vstupenka do světa programování. Nauč se přemýšlet jako programátor a efektivně využívat Python na řešení nejrůznějších problémů. Online Python Akademie znamená celkem 12 týdnů, vždy jedna lekce týdně, večer od 18:00 do 21:00. Následující kurz začíná 9. listopadu.
articles.title: Online Python Akademie: začněte s programováním v oblíbeném jazyce (online kurz)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Google byla přistižena při zobrazování škodlivé reklamy, která je tak přesvědčivá, že se jí pravděpodobně podařilo oklamat některé uživatele. Jde o reklamu na otevřeného správce hesel Keepass, u které není možné poznat, že jde o podvrh. Google ovšem na svém webu tvrdí, že zobrazované reklamy prověřuje.
articles.title: Falešná doména správce hesel Keepass zneužívá záměny znaků v IDN

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři počítali s tím, že Debian 12 Bookworm bude mít sloučený obsah adresáře /usr, jako to už delší dobu mají ostatní distribuce. Technický výbor Debianu se na začátku letošního roku rozhodl zavést moratorium na přesouvání sloučených souborů.
articles.title: Debian počítá se sloučením /usr v příštím vydání, zrušil dočasné moratorium

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V listopadu se účet Firefoxu přejmenuje na účet Mozilly. Jedná se o změnu názvu, která odráží postupnou změnu použití tohoto uživatelského účtu. Původně šlo o účet, který byl spojen pouze se synchronizací dat prohlížeče Firefox. Postupně se jeho použití rozšířilo na další služby, jako je třeba Mozilla VPN či Pocket. Původní značka Firefox již přesně neodráží široký rozsah nabídky Mozilly, uvádí dokument se zdůvodněním.
articles.title: Účet Firefoxu se v listopadu přejmenuje na účet Mozilly

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Jaromír Novák na blogu organizace CZ.NIC upozorňuje na zprávu Evropské komise nazvanou Broadbandové pokrytí 2022. Ta obsahuje srovnání rozvoje vysokorychlostních sítí elektronických komunikací mezi lety 2021 a 2022 v 31 evropských zemích. Zpráva zahrnuje porovnání rozvoje 11 technologií umožňujících vysokorychlostního přístupu k internetu – DSL, VDSL, VDSL2 vectoring, kabelový modem DOCSIS 3.0, kabelový modem DOCSIS 3.1, FTTP, FWA, LTE, 5G, 5G v pásmu 3,4–3,8 GHz a satelitní připojení.
articles.title: Evropská komise vydala zprávu Broadbandové pokrytí 2022

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Qualcomm potvrdil, že ve spolupráci se společností Google vyvíjí čip „RISC-V Snapdragon Wear“ a plánuje komerčně rozšířit řešení pro nositelná zařízení postavená na RISC-V. Tyto základy pomohou připravit půdu pro další produkty v rámci ekosystému Android, které budou moci využívat výhody vlastních procesorů s nízkou spotřebou a vysokým výkonem, vysvětluje Qualcomm.
articles.title: Společnost Qualcomm oznámila první SoC pro Android s hlavním jádrem na RISC-V

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Velmi vážná zranitelnost s označením CVE-2023–20198 dostala maximální stupeň závažnosti 10. Nachází se ve webovém uživatelském rozhraní softwaru Cisco IOS XE. Zranitelný je každý síťový přepínač, směrovač nebo řadič bezdrátové sítě LAN se systémem IOS XE, který má povolenou funkci serveru HTTP nebo HTTPS a je vystaven internetu.
articles.title: Nezáplatovaná chyba ohrožuje Cisco IOS XE, napadeny jsou tisíce prvků

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Tchajwanský výrobce síťových zařízení D-Link potvrdil únik dat, který vedl k odhalení podle něj „málo citlivých a poloveřejných informací“. Data zřejmě nepocházejí z cloudu, ale pravděpodobně ze starého systému D-View 6, jehož životnost skončila již v roce 2015. Data byla tehdy použita pro účely registrace. Zatím nic nenasvědčuje tomu, že by stará data obsahovala jakákoli ID uživatelů nebo finanční informace, píše firma ve svém vyjádření.
articles.title: Společnost D-Link potvrdila únik dat způsobený phishingovým útokem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Molnár)
articles.description: Komunita video-streamingových nadšenců a profesionálů pořádá čtvrtý meetup ze série WeStream. Michal Hošna (CDN77) bude povídat o přípravě filmů pro streaming a Petr Friml (Sky | Showmax) o problému low latency v live streamu.
articles.title: WeStream meetup #4: příprava filmů pro streaming a problém latence

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Na Distrowatchi nejnavštěvovanější distribuce MX Linux má nové aktualizační vydání MX Linux 23.1. Staví na Debianu 12.2 a přidává aktualizace aplikací, přičemž tvůrci vypichují několik změn.
articles.title: MX Linux 23.1 s vylepšeními pro KDE, Xfce i Fluxbox

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Hrach)
articles.description: Bylo objeveno, že ve Firefoxu běžícím na X.org (a možná i dalších grafických rozhraních) může JavaScript ve stránce, i když je stránka v nevybraném panelu a prohlížeč je na pozadí, zapisovat do schránky libovolné hodnoty.
articles.title: Pastejack: útok přepisováním schránky ve Firefoxu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Už za 14 dní bude ukončena výzva Call for Abstracts týkající se komunitního setkání nejen českých a slovenských správců sítí CSNOG 2024. Zájemci, kteří by chtěli prezentovat, můžou nyní poprvé přihlásit své příspěvky do tematicky zaměřených sekcí – Správa sítí, Legislativa a regulace a Akademické projekty.
articles.title: Přihlaste včas svůj příspěvek na síťařský CSNOG 2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Jako každý říjen vyšlo nové Ubuntu s deriváty a tentokrát také s komplikacemi. Začátek podzimu krom toho přinesl další povýšení na Debian 12 v odvozených distribucích Linux Mint Debian Edition, SpiralLinux či Raspberry Pi OS, nové obrazy přímo Debianu a aktualizace IPFire, Porteus, Tails, elementary OS, Slax, OpenWrt či Window Maker Live.
articles.title: Distribuční novinky 39-41/2023

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Geopolitika mění trh s čipy, podíl Tchaj-wanu podle IDC klesne. Infor uvádí nové verze svých odvětvově specifických řešení CloudSuite. Amazon rozvíjí služby umělé inteligence: rozhraní Bedrock je nyní všeobecně dostupné, firma nabízí i další novinky. Absencí energetického managementu přicházejí tuzemské firmy ročně o stovky tisíc korun. Zmrazená část kvantového počítače může komunikovat bezdrátově. Řešení pro generativní umělou inteligenci od Dell Technologies urychlují podnikovou transformaci.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Geopolitika mění trh s čipy, podíl Tchaj-wanu podle IDC klesne

articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 42/2023

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Třikrát supravodivost: grafenové kvazikrystaly, strojové učení a Majoranovy kvazičástice. Led XIX: nově objevená fáze. Je elektron spíš koule, nebo vajíčko? Na Venuši možná blesk neudeří. Evropa bude mít svůj první superpočítač s výkonem v řádu trilionů operací za sekundu.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Umělá inteligence poprvé kompletně detekovala a klasifikovala supernovu

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Pure se zákazníkům zavazuje platit za energii a prostor úložiště. Poznejte vývoj low-code a no-code. Taktik překvapil. V Česku je nejméně ICT specialistek z celé EU. Přístup low-code používá skoro polovina firem. Náklady na cloud se snadno mohou vymknout kontrole.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Přístup low-code používá skoro polovina firem

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Uvažujete o upgradu vašeho operačního systému? Přestaňte hledat, právě teď jste schopni získat skvělé slevy na Windows a Office. Skutečně můžete dostat vysoké slevy na pravé Windows 10 a Microsoft Office s doživotní licencí, když nenakoupíte přímo u Microsoftu, ale místo toho zamíříte na Goodoffer24. Vážně, jen si zkontrolujte neskutečné ceny, pokud upgradujete váš ekosystém s Windows.

articles.description: Antihmota v gravitaci Země padá jako normální běžná hmota. Umelou inteligenci regulací nezastavíme, Evropě hrozí technologické zaostávání. Obří černé díry ovlivňují chemické složení svých galaxií. Původ Saturnových prstenců srážkou ledových měsíců planety.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Brunova konstanta a řada převrácených hodnot prvočíselných dvojic

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Slavní „pěstitelé“ jablíček si své nové produkty před uvedením na trh rádi schovávají a své žhavé přírůstky představují mnohdy až na poslední chvíli. Fanouškům tak často nezbývá nic jiného, než se uchýlit k ještě žhavějším spekulacím a doufat, že se firma bude držet svých železně pravidelných dat vydání. Bude Apple sklízet úspěch i v roce 2023?

articles.description: Přehled zářijových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra, citáty týdne a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Řízené IT služby na českém trhu. Red Hat a Oracle rozšiřují spolupráci a přinášejí Red Hat OpenShift do cloudové infrastruktury Oracle. Infrastruktura jako kód: Zjednodušte své implementace v cloudu automatizací. V Evropě rostou výdaje na umělou inteligenci rychleji než celosvětově. Inovace vs. riziko: IT lídři se obávají o bezpečnost technologických inovací.

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byly publikovány informace o bezpečnostním problému iLeakage (pdf) zařízení od společnosti Apple. Po více než roce od nahlášení Applu. S vlastní doménou a logem. Útočník může využít spekulativního provádění instrukcí a například z jednoho panelu webového prohlížeče Safari získat jméno a heslo použito v druhém panelu, viz YouTube.
articles.title: iLeakage, bezpečnostní problém zařízení od společnosti Apple

articles.title: TrueNAS SCALE 23.10 „Cobia“

articles.description: X.Org X server 21.1.9 a Xwayland 23.2.2 řeší 3 bezpečnostní chyby: CVE-2023-5367, CVE-2023-5380 a CVE-2023-5574.
articles.title: X.Org X server 21.1.9 a Xwayland 23.2.2 řeší 3 bezpečnostní chyby

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byl vydán Mozilla Firefox 119.0. Přehled novinek v poznámkách k vydání, poznámkách k vydání pro firmy a na stránce věnované vývojářům. Vypíchnout lze vylepšený Přehled Firefoxu (Firefox View). Řešeny jsou rovněž bezpečnostní chyby. Nový Firefox 119 je již k dispozici také na Flathubu a Snapcraftu.
articles.title: Firefox 119.0

articles.author: bkralik
articles.description:
Za poslední měsíc se událo spoustu nového. Se strahovskými bastlíři jste se mohli potkat na LinuxDays, kde jste si mohli zapájet demoboard s novým procesorem CH32V003 (RISC-V za deset centů, pro který mimochodem Vojta Suk napsal programátor běžící na Flipper Zero). Vyšlo Raspberry Pi 5 se spoustou inovací (i nových bugů), nový iPhone s Thread rádiem a USB-C místo Lightningu (který začali bastlíři hned hackovat) a v KiCADu už jde dělat databázové knihovny přes Inventree.

Ze světa hardwaru si můžete něco poslechnout o nových osciloskopech od Rigolu (a jak probíhá jejich hackování), nové knize o Micro:bit deskách, koprocesoru RP1 na Rapsberry Pi 5, novém Turrisu nebo jak si postavit reléovou ústřednu s ethernetem a SCPI. Možná dojde i na ukázku redukce mezi USB a komunistickou kopií GPIB známou jako IMS-2.

Pokud jde o měkčí stránku bastlířství, tedy software, představí bastlíři nový Node-RED. Nedávno se objevil také levný čínský radar schopný rozeznat více objektů najednou a proběhlo další kolo TinyTapeout, ve kterém je možné nechat si vyrobit vlastní ASIC.

Že byl tento měsíc velmi plodný a náročný, lze poznat i z toho, že tentokráte mají strahováci neobvykle málo bizarních témat, mezi nimiž tentokrát kralují ESD kroksy a masivně paralelní instalace Rapsberry Pi v průmyslovém prostředí, která samozřejmě skončila neslavně.

Příští Virtuální Bastlírna se pod taktovkou projektu MacGyver studentského klubu SiliconHill bude konat ve středu 25. října od 20:00 minimálně do 22:00 (ale obvykle končí o dost později). Odkaz na konferenci se před samotnou akcí objeví na bastlířské wiki.
articles.title: Virtuální Bastlírna vol. 31: Už jste si pohráli s RISC-V za 10 centů?

Z novinek lze vypíchnout podporu nových typů zařízení: chladničky, pokojové klimatizace, myčky nádobí, pračky, robotické vysavače, …

articles.description: Shortly after today's Mesa 23.3 branching and opening Mesa 24.0-devel on Git main, Mesa 23.3-rc1 is now formally available as the first weekly release candidate for this quarter's feature series...
articles.title: Mesa 23.3-rc1 Available For Testing With NVIDIA Vulkan Driver, Raspberry Pi 5 Support

articles.description: For those wishing to interact with Steam from virtual reality (VR) headsets, today Valve promoted SteamVR 2.0 to stable...

articles.description: Fedora 39 failed to make its "early" release target date, it didn't meet its otherwise targeted release date one week later, and is now facing another possible setback still. These release delays have been due to outstanding blocker bugs all related to the Raspberry Pi...

articles.description: With the new AMD Ryzen 7 PRO 7840U Zen 4 mobile processor powering the likes of the Lenovo ThinkPad P14s Gen 4, I was curious about the performance impact of employing full disk encryption. Here are some benchmarks looking at the performance cost to enabling full disk encryption versus not utilizing any disk encryption while running Fedora Workstation on the new ThinkPad P14s Gen 4 AMD laptop.
articles.title: Benchmarking The Performance Cost To Full Disk Encryption For Modern AMD Ryzen Laptops

articles.description: Building off the recent release of OSPRay 3.0 with initial GPU acceleration support, OSPRay Studio has now been updated against this new version. As a reminder, OSPRay Studio is Intel's open-source interactive visualization and ray-tracing application...
articles.title: Intel Releases OSPRay Studio 0.13 With Xe GPU Acceleration Support

articles.description: Fedora Linux is looking at possibly transitioning from Zlib to Zlib-NG for this widely-used compression library. This tentative change request is filed in part by Intel software engineers looking to enhance the Zlib performance on modern processors...
articles.title: Fedora To Possibly Transition From Zlib To Zlib-NG For Better Performance

articles.description: There were many interesting talks last week at XDC 2023 in Spain around Rusticl, the open-source NVIDIA Vulkan driver, the Raspberry Pi graphics driver, RADV ray-tracing, AMD color management and HDR with the Steam Deck / Gamescope, and others. One of the other talks many Phoronix readers are likely to be interested in is around the state of the Wine Wayland driver...
articles.title: The Ongoing Work For Native Wine Wayland Support

articles.description: AMDVLK 2023.Q4.1 was published today as AMD's first Radeon Vulkan open-source driver update since last month. There comes some new features and improvements with this version but they have also decided to drop Polaris (GFX8) and Vega (GFX9) graphics support...
articles.title: AMDVLK 2023.Q4.1: Polaris & Vega Support Dropped, Counter-Strike 2 Tuning

articles.description: Red Hat engineers continue working on Stratis Storage as a modern Linux storage solution that leverages the Rust programming language and built atop the proven XFS file-system and LVM. Stratis continues to strive for ZFS and Btrfs like functionality although its use in the wild still seems rather limited...
articles.title: Stratis 3.6 Released For Improving Linux Storage Management

articles.description: The X.Org Server and XWayland saw new point releases today as a result of three more security vulnerabilities being disclosed...
articles.title: XWayland & X.Org Server See New Releases Due To Three More Security Vulnerabilities

articles.description: Most Linux desktop users/gamers/enthusiasts are relying on XWayland for X11 client compatibility atop Wayland compositors in the "rootless" mode. With the XWayland rootless mode, X11 applications and games can integrate nicely within a Wayland desktop environment with just the individual client window presented. However, for those interested, the XWayland "rootful" mode has become more capable this year for those wanting to render an entire X11 environment within the Wayland compositor as a window...
articles.title: XWayland's Rootful Mode Is Becoming More Useful

articles.description: Since AMD's acquisition of Xilinx and working to broaden the portfolio of offerings for the data center, more AMD-Xilinx drivers have been working their way toward the mainline Linux kernel. There's been upstreaming efforts such as the Versal EDAC driver, generating DeviceTree nodes for PCI devices, Versal watchdog driver, QDMA driver, CDX bus support, and more. The latest driver working its way toward the mainline kernel from AMD is the AXI 1-wire driver...
articles.title: AXI 1-Wire Driver Is AMD's Latest Upstreaming Effort To The Linux Kernel

articles.description: The VKMS driver as a virtual kernel mode-setting solution as a software-only implementation of KMS for use with primarily headless Linux systems continues tacking on more features. Maíra Canal and Melissa Wen presented last week at XDC 2023 on the VKMS driver that continues proving very useful for headless platforms as well as for testing purposes...
articles.title: The VKMS Display Driver Continues Evolving Nicely For Headless Linux Systems

articles.description: As yet another open-source Radeon Linux graphics driver change ahead of the upcoming Mesa 23.3 code branching and feature freeze is Vulkan VK_KHR_cooperative_matrix support with the RADV driver for RDNA3 hardware and newer using the GPU's Wavefront Mixed-precision Multiply Accumulate (WMMA) functionality...
articles.title: RADV Vulkan Driver Merges Cooperative Matrix Support Using RDNA3 WMMA

articles.description: As we approach the end of 2023, sadly, the real-time kernel "PREEMPT_RT" support still hasn't been mainlined... The main blocker pending is still the ongoing work around non-blocking consoles / threaded console handling to then allow the few dozen remaining out-of-tree RT kernel patches to be merged. The good news is that when the PREEMPT_RT support is ready for mainline, it looks like the RISC-V architecture support will also be real-time friendly too...
articles.title: Linux RISC-V Preparing For Real-Time Kernel Support (PREEMPT_RT)

articles.description: AMD's RadeonSI Gallium3D driver has been around for a decade since the Radeon HD 7000 "Southern Islands" graphics card days while finally the OpenGL renderer string is being changed to reflect "RadeonSI" as the name of the driver in use...
articles.title: AMD Making It More Clear When Their RadeonSI OpenGL Driver Is Being Used

articles.description: Given recent talk of upstream Linux Long-Term Support (LTS) kernels likely being reduced from six to two year support windows moving forward, Canonical today decided to re-affirm their support for ten years of support with Ubuntu Long Term Support versions...
articles.title: Canonical To Stick With 10 Year Support Cycle For Ubuntu LTS Releases

articles.description: Samuel Pitoiset of Valve's open-source Linux graphics driver team has landed initial support for GFX11.5 "RDNA3 refresh" graphics within the RADV Vulkan driver for the upcoming Mesa 23.3...
articles.title: RADV Vulkan Driver Lands Initial Support For GFX11.5 "RDNA3 Refresh"

articles.description: While Meteor Lake isn't shipping until December, Intel's open-source Linux engineers for months have already been working on 15th Gen Arrow Lake (as well as Lunar Lake, among their other processor lines) for getting the driver support in order. The latest early hardware enablement to talk about is the initial Arrow Lake S support coming to their video acceleration drivers...
articles.title: Intel Video Acceleration Drivers Begin Preparing For Arrow Lake S

articles.description: In addition to old and unmaintained Ethernet driver code set for removal, there is an effort underway to clear out some obsolete and orphaned WiFi drivers from the Linux kernel...
articles.title: Linux's Latest Plan For Removing Old WiFi Drivers

articles.description: Canonical continues investing in Mir as their Wayland compositor and set of platform abstraction interfaces to make it easier for IoT and other "smart" devices to run atop Ubuntu Core. Most recently the Mir developers have been working to partially re-architect their graphics platform handling to better handle multiple GPU/display devices...
articles.title: Ubuntu's Mir Working On Hybrid Graphics / Multi-GPU Support

articles.description: Ahead of the official planned announcement for Tuesday, the Mozilla Firefox 119.0 release binaries have been published for this monthly feature update...
articles.title: Firefox 119 Available With Improved Firefox View, Expanded PDF Editing

articles.description: While the recently released Ubuntu 23.10 is bringing some performance improvements to Intel Xeon Max / Sapphire Rapids, Ubuntu Linux still isn't delivering the best possible out-of-the-box server performance. For that Intel continues to show the importance of software optimizations with the likes of their in-house Clear Linux platform as well as the likes of CentOS Stream having more sensible defaults. Here is a look at the Intel Xeon Max 9480 performance across Ubuntu 22.04 LTS, Ubuntu 23.10, CentOS Stream 9, Fedora Server 39, and Clear Linux 40130.
articles.title: Intel Continues To Demonstrate The Importance Of Software Optimizations: Clear Linux + Xeon Max Benchmarks

articles.description: While most hardware vendors are relying on LLVM when it comes to offloading compute work to GPUs, AI accelerators, FPGAs, and similar heterogeneous compute environments, right now each vendor is basically creating their own LLVM offloading run-time among a lot of other duplicated -- and often downstream only -- code. The new "llvm/offload" project hopes to lead to better collaboration in this area...
articles.title: LLVM Looking To Better Collaborate Around Common AI/GPU/FPGA Offloading

articles.description: Following an FCV optimization for the latest Intel graphics hardware, ASTC LDR emulation, some still-pending Vulkan sparse support for ANV atop the existing i915 driver, and other recent Intel open-source "ANV" Vulkan driver optimizations, another optimization was just merged into Mesa 23.3...
articles.title: Intel Vulkan Driver Lands Optimization To Help GravityMark, Other Demanding Software

articles.description: The Etnaviv Gallium3D driver within Mesa has long been focused on reverse engineering and supporting Vivante graphics IP found in various SoCs. That driver has worked out well for open-source OpenGL support for Vivante graphics while more recently Etnaviv has begun tackling Vivante neural processing unit (NPU) support that is beginning to be found in various SoCs...
articles.title: Etnaviv NPU Support Coming Together, Mesa Upstreaming Next

articles.description: After the Raspberry Pi 5 was excitingly announced a few weeks ago, Eben Upton shared today that ramping up the production has gone better than initially anticipated and that these AArch64 single board computers are beginning to ship to customers...
articles.title: Raspberry Pi 5 Single Board Computers Begin Shipping

articles.title: Linux 6.6-rc7 Released: Linux 6.6 Final Likely Next Sunday

articles.description: For those that happen to have QLogic 10Gb PCIe Ethernet adapters, the mainline Linux kernel is planning to remove this driver from the kernel source tree unless any active users step-up...
articles.title: QLogic 10Gb "QLGE" Ethernet Driver Set To Be Removed From The Linux Kernel

articles.title: Milk-V Oasis Sounds Like An Interesting RISC-V Board With 16 Cores, Up To 64GB LPDDR5

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Studio Wildcard revealed the first gameplay trailer for ARK: Survival Ascended today during Microsoft's Xbox Partner Preview stream. They followed up the reveal with the announcement that the remake of the dino-themed survival game will be releasing today on PC via Steam.




At its core, ARK: Survival Ascended (ASA) is a next-generation remake of the original ARK: Survival Evolved. More specifically, ASA utilizes Unreal Engine 5 to boast big improvements and enhancements to the visuals and gameplay. As such, the codebase for ARK has been fully rewritten and the artwork recreated. ASA has also utilizes UE5-specific features such as Lumen to really push the graphical fidelity.


Life finds a way!



“ASA provides an evergreen adventure that re-energizes the classic-ARK experience, one that …
articles.title: ARK: Survival Ascended (ASA) is out today on PC, consoles delayed to November

articles.author: Jeff Scott
articles.description:
In the year 2024, a new Castlevania-like title is coming our way - for the Game Boy Color.


Coming to us courtesy of Incube8 Games and the development team at Spacebot Interactive, Dracula: Dark Reign is unique in that it's the first video game ever to be equipped with the Stoker license. Bram Stoker published his iconic novel Dracula in 1897. 













Bram's great-grandnephew Dacre Stoker created the StokerVerse label alongside his partner Chris McAuley. The duo aims to publish games, comics, and novels under the StokerVerse banner. Each of these is inspired by the works of Bram Stoker. 


Because Dark Reign sports the StokerVerse license, it's able to take a deep dive into the world of the 1897 novel. Players will take on the role of the story's protagonist, Jonathan Harker, as he attempts to escape the vampire's castle. The upcoming Game Boy Color Metroidvania title even features a never-before-seen prologue to the original book that's pulled from Bram Stoker's personal notes. 


Incube8 Games promises a "unique blend of storytelling, exploration, and action" within Dracula: Dark Reign. All of which is based on Stoker's source material from many, many years ago. 


Dracula: Dark Reign makes its physical Game Boy Color cartridge debut in 2024 for $59.99. A future Digital Edition is also planned that will be playable via PC or Mac emulators. A demo is available for players to try out on the Dracula: Dark Reign demo page. 

The post A Castlevania-style Bram Stoker’s Dracula game is coming to Game Boy Color appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: A Castlevania-style Bram Stoker’s Dracula game is coming to Game Boy Color

articles.author: Andrea Gonzalez
articles.description:
Many indie titles in the past several years have taken visual inspiration from previous generations. Some draw from the NES and SNES eras, but lately more are taking cues from the PS1/N64 generation. 


These distinctive visual echoes from years past have undoubtedly made it far easier to appreciate the aesthetic while playing something notably contemporary. At least, that's how I view many of these games, since occasional visits to previous generations can sometimes be painful.


That said, some of the best games from the last several years have retro games to thank, be they platformers, survival horror, or RPGs. Some of these are the best in their respective years with others being quite underrated gems.


Screenshot via Radical Fish Games


CrossCode


CrossCode is an ARPG with a 16-bit…
articles.title: Nine great retro-inspired indies you can play today

articles.author: Andrea Shearon
articles.description:
Today's Xbox showcase debuted new footage and releases for games headed to Game Pass and Series X|S devices, including Ark, Like A Dragon, Alan Wake 2, and more. 


New reveals for other games, like Robocop: Rogue City, The Final, and Ikaro: Will Not Die, were also featured at the show. While they aren't all brand-new titles, we did see gameplay reveals and demonstrations for games planning a 2024 launch, and even a few coming up soon. For a full list, keep scrolling; we've included the TLDR plus the Xbox Showcase trailer. 


Like A Dragon: Infinite Wealth adds Animal Crossing




Release Date: January 26, 2024
Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PC (Steam, Windows), PS4, PS5
Yakuza can, and will, get all of us into the series someway, somehow. During today's Xbox Partner showcase, developer Ryu Ga…
articles.title: Everything shown at the Xbox Partner Preview

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Publisher Hooded Horse and developer Slavic Magic revealed today that the upcoming medieval strategy title Manor Lords has a release date. Players will be able to don the mantle of Medieval Lord as they oversee their own medieval manor on April 26. Manor Lords will also launch as a Day One title on Game Pass for PC.




Yes, mi'lord?


Manor Lords features a unique playstyle, allowing players to manage the city-building of their manor while also fighting off threats such as bandits and rival lords. As a lord, players will exploit the local resources to build up their castle and surrounding kingdom. As you expand your settlement you will establish trade routes and master your surroundings as you seek to meet the demands of your people.


In terms of combat, Manor Leads features a real-time tactical combat system where you rally your working population in your manor as militia to join you on the battlefield. As your military is also your workforce, each death on the battlefield can result in a labor shortage once the war is over.


It was also revealed that Manor Lords will eventually make its way to consoles as well, at which time it will also be a Day One on Xbox title.


I've had my eye on Manor Lords since it was revealed. There was a demo during a Steam Next Fest months ago and I know a lot of people enjoyed it. Even though I didn't get a chance to play it, the bits I saw looked like quite an experience. It looks like things have been even further optimized as well. It's always cool when you get to build things and then also go down in first person and explore.


Manor Lords releases on April 26 on PC and as a Day One on Game Pass title.

The post Manor Lords releases in April and is Day One on Game Pass appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Manor Lords releases in April and is Day One on Game Pass

articles.author: Christine Choi
articles.description:
HoYoverse has posted a new developers discussion detailing some quality-of-life changes coming soon to Genshin Impact in Version 4.2. While the developers note they are "still working on many other optimizations," the fixes revealed below should streamline several things for long-time players.


Skip prerequisites for weekly bosses


First on the list is a change to how weekly bosses are unlocked in Genshin Impact. Some weekly boss domains are normally unlocked by progressing through certain quests. If you don’t have time to complete these quests, those domains remain inaccessible in your world, meaning you don’t have easy access to valuable weekly drops.


With a new change to the weekly domains, you can now access the boss fights through the Adventurer’s Handbook starting from Adventure …
articles.title: Genshin Impact announces streamlined boss fights, other quality-of-life changes for Version 4.2

articles.author: Michael Murphy
articles.description:
Leave it to Ryu Ga Gotoku Studios to bring Like a Dragon to life... simulation. Announced at the Xbox Partner Showcase, Like a Dragon: Infinite Wealth is adding an Animal Crossing-like mode to its gameplay.




In the new trailer, Ichiban arrives via dolphin (what else did you expect?) at DonDoko Island and gets free reign over the isle. We trade in the turn-based brawling and dramatic stories for quiet spearfishing and bug catching. Instead of running and battling around Kamurocho and Honolulu City, you get to swim in clear blue water and give wholesome presents to people. There are even fun mascots to cheer you on, just like Animal Crossing. Though I'm not sure these would make the cut at Nintendo.


Onto New Horizons


Using the materials you collect on the island, you can craft a varie…
articles.title: Like A Dragon: Infinite Wealth adds Yakuza Animal Crossing, decorations and all

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Paradox Interactive has revealed a new region pack is on the way for Grand Strategy title Victoria 3. In the Colossus of the South region pack, players will face challenges as they seek to lead Brazil through a rise of power after being freed from the domination of Europe.




Build a New Hemispheric Power


Launching alongside the DLC pack is update 1.5. The massive update will rework warfare, companies, and how local prices works in Victoria 3. According to the video for the DLC, this is the biggest update to military, economy, and diplomacy in the grand strategy title yet.


The Colossus of the South region pack is a narrative-driven pack centered around the Amazon River as South America enters the Victorian Age. Features of the pack include:



Reign of Pedro II: Historical actions hig…
articles.title: Victoria 3: Colossus of the South Region Pack drops next month

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Over 200 microgames are on the menu for WarioWare: Move It!, and a new trailer is here to show how to control those forms.


Nintendo shared a three-minute overview of the next entry in the speedy series. This one offers up a better idea of all the poses you'll need to contort your body into through each game. There's shaking, dancing, punching, wiggling, and plenty of nose-picking throughout. The new footage from Nintendo's latest trailer shows off both singleplayer and local multiplayer modes. 




In addition to highlighting forms, the trailer previews Museum Mode, which lets you choose from microgames and practice at different speeds. Party mode lets two to four players compete against one another in five different games. There are the bizarro rules of Galactic Conquest and the order-following Listen to the Doctor. Medusa March has you crawling a dungeon while avoiding the stone-cold stare of Medusa herself. Go the Distance puts you through a microgame gauntlet with your dukes up. Finally, you can test your guessing game skills in The Who's in Control show, which requires four players. 


Screenshot via Nintendo YouTube


Wah, Wah, Yeah!


Like previous WarioWare games, there's a Story Mode that lets you play through stages featuring different characters. All the stages put the spotlight on their own forms to keep you on your toes. It looks as ridiculous as ever, even if some of it will no doubt depend on how many friends you can wrangle together for local multiplayer. WarioWare: Move It! hits Nintendo Switch around the world on November 3, 2023. 

The post WarioWare: Move It! busts all the moves in Party Mode and minigame overview appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: WarioWare: Move It! busts all the moves in Party Mode and minigame overview

articles.author: Zoey Handley
articles.description:
No More Robots has announced that Cheesemaker’s ghostly bathhouse game, Spirittea is set to release on November 13 for Switch, Xbox (on GamePass), and PC. Alongside the announcement is an 8-minute in-depth look at the game.


Spirittea is a management quest game (think Stardew Valley) inspired by Studio Ghibli’s Spirited Away. You play as a writer, trying to get some peace to pen your next novel. Drinking from the wrong teapot causes the spirit realm to fold over into reality. You’re given the keys to a bathhouse, where you then scrub down spirits and help them relax.




Cheesemaker describes Spirittea as a “life sim, management game, and detective game all in one.” Essentially, that means you help the townsfolk exorcise the ghosts that are bothering them, which you then try to accommodate within your bathhouse. The bathhouse can be upgraded, which is necessary to attract some of the spirits. Beyond that is a life simulator with four seasons that affect what quests you can accomplish.


This might be exactly what I need right now. Management games tend to be my go-to for relaxation. I can definitely dig the Mother 3-style art, though it’s a bit jarring when a character portrait comes up, and they’re much more realistically drawn. Nonetheless, the Spirited Away influence is obvious, and that’s something I can totally dig. I think I’ll probably play this one.


Spirittea is coming to Switch, Xbox, and PC on November 13, 2023. There’s a demo available for it right now.

The post Ghost scrubbing simulator Spirittea arrives on November 13 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Ghost scrubbing simulator Spirittea arrives on November 13

articles.author: Andrew Heaton
articles.description:
Hardly anyone would've been surprised to learn that Starfield was the best-selling game in the US for September. To add to that, not only has Bethesda's newest release been played by more than 11 million people so far, it's also been a major achievement for Game Pass.


That's according to a recent Microsoft earnings call, which took place on October 24. Among a bunch of other wins for the tech giant, Starfield has done wonders for the Xbox subscription service. According to the transcript (or you could listen to the whole audio if you prefer), the deep space adventure set a new record for the "most Game Pass subscriptions added on a single day ever."




Among the 11 million people that have taken to the stars, almost half of them played the game on PC. The transcript goes on to say that Starfield's launch has "benefited Xbox content and services."


The rich get richer


In gaming overall, Microsoft has said that revenue has "increased 9% and 8% in constant currency" with a "better-than-expected subscriber growth in Xbox Game Pass." No prizes for guessing which game is pretty much responsible for this uptick (no, not Redfall. Why would you say that?).


The hype behind Starfield was pretty immense for what felt like a long time. Given that it's Bethesda's first game since Microsoft bought the company in 2021, Xbox put its muscle behind the space-faring RPG.


Many of us might be losing a bit of interest in the game now, but the revenue and player count show just how popular Skyrim-in-space has been. But will it last as long as The Elder Scrolls 5? Only time will tell (I say no).

The post More than 11 million people have played Starfield, Microsoft says appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: More than 11 million people have played Starfield, Microsoft says

articles.author: Timothy Monbleau
articles.description:
Thinking about renewing your Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack membership? It’s that time of year when many yearlong memberships lapse, so Nintendo has strategically announced that Mario Party 3 will become playable for Nintendo Switch owners around the world this week.


Mario Party 3 is the culmination of the original Mario Party trilogy on Nintendo’s 64-bit console. In many ways, it offered more of what the previous two entries did. There were more boards to play on, more minigames to ruin your thumbstick with, and more random elements to ruin your friendships. That said, I can’t lie; I really liked this one back in the day. Even today, I still hear many consider this one the best in the series.


With that in mind, I can sort of see why Nintendo might tempt Switch owners into ano…
articles.title: Mario Party 3 arrives on Nintendo Switch Online October 27

articles.author: Andrew Heaton
articles.description:
It's no secret that Bethesda games are notorious for being pretty broken. Starfield is no exception and while we wait around for Todd Howard and his crew to unleash an update for its latest IP, the fan base has things covered for now.


As spotted by DSO Gaming, Starfield's Community Patch is now ready to download if you have the game on PC. The mod is the result of a series of people working together to make improvements to Bethesda's space-faring RPG. You can download the patch here.


Image via Bethesda/Steam.


Bundled with this fan-made mod is a series of fixes for the game, including addressing script errors, game-breaking exploits, faulty quests, inconsistencies, and more. It even fixes a few spelling errors as well.


What the Community Patch is not


While this mod aims to fix some glaring and not-so-glaring problems with Starfield, it's good to clear the air about what you shouldn't expect from the download. 


For starters – as the description itself says – the Community Patch does not offer any new content or changes to the overall balance of the game outside "correcting obvious errors." It's specifically designed to address glitches and some other issues, hopefully making for a better experience.


The patch also uses an MIT license, which means it's open-source. As a result, this mod is "intended to be owned by the community, rather than an individual or team." Therefore, anybody who wishes to contribute to the patch can do so.


Obviously, Bethesda will be sending out its own hotfixes and updates in the future. What these will address cannot be said at this stage, so it's nice to have a fan solution in the interim.

The post Starfield’s Community Patch is here, bringing bug fixes and tweaks appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Starfield’s Community Patch is here, bringing bug fixes and tweaks

articles.author: Andrew Heaton
articles.description:
At this point, it's safe to say that people are ready for The Elder Scrolls 6. While we're likely still years away from playing it, it feels as though Bethesda will start putting more stock into the Skyrim follow-up now that Starfield is out.


With that in-mind, a recent interview with MinnMax suggests that some elements from previous TES games will make their way into the sixth installment. Former Bethesda employee Bruce Nesmith – who was lead designer for Skyrim – has said that elements that go as far back as Oblivion could be "further developed" for The Elder Scrolls 6.


That particular part of the interview begins around the one-hour 13-minute mark.




However, Nesmith is not certain what these aspects will be. He does add that we will find his "fingerprints" in the next installment based on how the games have been designed in the past and his impact on the series.


It's a kind of magic


Nesmith then goes on to say that TES6 will likely have traces of the magical elements from Skyrim. So if you like the magic system in TES5, that's something to perhaps look forward to (maybe).


Bruce had been involved with the Elder Scrolls franchise since 1996's Daggerfall, eventually becoming Senior Game Designer for Bethesda. He was also a quest designer for Fallout 3. If you've played a Bethesda RPG since the mid-90s, you'll have experienced Nesmith's input. These days, he's a fantasy novelist. His first novel, Mischief Maker: Norse Mythology Reimagined, was released in 2021.


As for The Elder Scrolls 6, we're still pretty much in the dark. Nesmith's comments seem largely speculative, so it's best not to take what he says as the final word in what the elusive Skyrim follow-up will be like.

The post Former Skyrim designer says his “fingerprints” will be on The Elder Scrolls 6 appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Former Skyrim designer says his “fingerprints” will be on The Elder Scrolls 6

articles.author: Andrea Gonzalez
articles.description:
After confirming Cities Skylines 2 has performance issues, developer Colossal Order clarified what problems and fixes players can expect. The studio recently held a Reddit AMA, answering questions and going into specific details regarding the performance issues. 


According to Colossal Order, it's working on improvements from the launch experience. The AMA hosted a sizeable amount of players asking about fixes, ranging from complaints about performance optimization to those eating away PC memory. 


"The plan is to flush out all the performance issues that come our way as quickly as we can," wrote chief technical officer co_damsku. "Several of those have come to our attention only recently due to certain hardware setup that yielded unexpected results."


Specific issues the developer is p…
articles.title: Cities Skylines 2 dev explains launch build performance issues, planned fixes

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
Dynamight Studios announced today that its open-world sandbox MMORPG Fractured Online will be returning to Steam Early Access. The official release date for the return is November 8 at 10 a.m. ET. It's been a rough road so far for the MMO. Originally Gamigo became the publisher for the game, but after a short period of time Dynamight pulled the MMO from steam and later parted ways with Gamigo. They are now self-publishing the MMO as it heads back into early access.




It seems to be the common thing now for MMORPG developers to part ways with their publisher and take on the role. A couple of years ago Pearl Abyss split ways with Kakao Games over publishing popular MMORPG Black Desert Online. Not-yet-released MMO Ashes of Creation also split ways with its publisher, My.Games, and will self-publish the MMO whenever it releases.


Regardless of the reason, it's good news for the players Gamigo has a history of killing MMOs, which they've done with Fiesta Online and most of Trion Worlds' lineup of MMOs including Archeage, Rift, and Trove.


As for Fractured Online, it looks like an entertaining twist on the sandbox MMO formula. Players will work together, and against one another, as they claim zones, gather resources, craft, trade, and build their own empire. The MMO features a player-driven economy as players can be farmers, hunters, scavengers, miners, crafters, and even merchants.


Apparently there were some wipes previously, but moving forward there will be no wipes unless it is "strictly necessary".


Fractured Online hits Early Access on Steam on November 8.

The post Fractured Online returns to Steam Early Access next month appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Fractured Online returns to Steam Early Access next month
